thread.title: John & Lindsay
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by John & Lindsay

author: John & Lindsay
title: John & Lindsay
text: What a pleasure is was using Nelson Alexander Carlton North office. The agent, Peter Varellas was particularly great, understanding and thoughtful of our experience. Selling your home can be stressful and Peter really made the process smooth and easy. We felt comfortable and secure that they had our best interests at heart. I would highly recommend them!
